entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Threads accumulating in Suspended state and issue with CLR Critical Section #72971
    Future
  • Reconsider naming of ObsoletedInOSPlatformAttribute #72970
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T>() in Blazor wasm is very slow #72969
  • API proposal: MemoryExtensions.ReferenceEqual #72968
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: support System.Diagnostics.TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file. #72967
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] crash on unix-arm64 in TestSimpleGenericRecursion__RecurseOverClass #72966
  • IdnMapping.GetAscii throws ArgumentException #72962
  • SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 consistently fails #72959
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not respect the Keep-Alive header #72958
  • [iOS] ZipArchive and ZipFile unicode test failures #72951
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] test failure #72946
    7.0.0
  • EmptyHandle.MDStreamVersion always throws ArgumentNullException #72943
  • [WASM] Browser tab crashes when dotnet-crypto-worker.js fails to connect to WebSocket #72941
    7.0.0
  • Reduce aot compilation time by caching precompiled assemblies #72938
  • Assertion failed 'retVal->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR)' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #72926
    7.0.0
  • ./src/tests/build.sh: No such file or directory #72921
  • [wasm] Switch the WBT tests from v8 to browser on Windows #72918
    7.0.0
  • Delete support for Marshal.GetTypeFromCLSID #72914
    Future
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CapacityTests.AddingReplacementWhenTotalSizeExceedsCapacityDoesNotUpdateRemovesOldEntryAndTriggersCompaction` #72912
  • Decide what to do with variant marshalling #72911
    Future
  • Refactor System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext tests to work for single file #72908
  • system.security.cryptography.x509certificates.tests work item #72906
  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #72904
  • UsePollingFileWatcher_UseActivePolling_HasChanged_SymbolicLink_TargetChanged failed due to access denied #72902

Closed

  • MemoryCache PostEvictionCallback unexpectedly using the wrong ILogger scope #69428
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mark the return value of `ILogger.BeginScope` MaybeNull #63867
    7.0.0
  • Add SqlTypes members to remove SqlClient internal access hacks #51836
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure<T>(IntPtr) throws NullReferenceException if IntPtr.Zero is used #72929
    7.0.0
  • GC deadlock/livelock? #66759
    7.0.0
  • AddSimpleConsole ignores IncludeScope #70822
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogRecord throws an InvalidOperationException on Windows 11 #60740
    7.0.0
  • WindowsServiceHelpers.IsWindowsService() always returns false on Windows Server 2022 #72915
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse2\\Sse2_ro\\Sse2_ro.cmd #70804
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure in `System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests` on `mono OSX x64` #72916
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.sh #58702
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeGeneratorTests\\TypeGeneratorTest197\\Generated197\\Generated197.cmd #60951
    7.0.0
  • system.net.http.functional.tests timing out on multiple platforms #72949
  • [API Proposal]: Add generic versions of System.Text.Json.Serialization attributes #72936
  • ReadyToRun build does not work on Windows 10 - no crash, just 0xC0000602 #61584
    7.0.0
  • Memory access violation when using named pipes on Alpine #58045
    7.0.0
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest' #69231
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd/dlbigleakthd.sh #63774
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\NotRMW_do\\NotRMW_do.cmd #59555
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/Layout/General/class02_seq_ser/class02_seq_ser.sh #63324
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest(posixRule: \"<+00>0<+01>,A/0,J365/25\", dayNumber: 0, monthNumber: 0, shouldSucceed: False) #72825
    7.0.0
  • JIT/Intrinsics/MemoryMarshalGetArrayDataReference from #72725 fails on Mono JIT #72745
    7.0.0
  • Failing test system.tests.gcextendedtests.getallocatedbytesforcurrentthread #65183
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/nested/nestedtry/throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r/throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r.sh #66327
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] NRE in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.TypeInfoResolverFunctionalTests.DoNotSerializeValue42 #72775
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #66921
    7.0.0
  • [mono/net4x] Attribute.InternalParamGetCustomAttributes(ParameterInfo, ...) throws IndexOutOfRangeException #72907
  • [wasm] Failure in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.SendReceiveTest.SendReceive_Concurrent_Success #57519
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] SendReceive_VaryingLengthBuffers_Success failing in CI #53957
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #72403
    7.0.0
  • TypeLoadException when using value types with empty generic T where T causes a Type cycle #72039
    Future
  • A strange TypeLoadException #72930
  • QPACK error during HTTP/3 stress #69310
    7.0.0
  • Bad codegen for a combination of `cpblk` and constant source #71156
    7.0.0
  • Add properties for arrays, strings and other System classes #66823
    7.0.0
  • WASM error handling in SubtleCrypto through web worker #69740
    7.0.0
  • memorycachesetandremovetests.getandset_arethreadsafe_andupdatesneverleavesnullvalues failed in CI #72905
  • [iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst] Test failures in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests #56073
    7.0.0
  • Add Mono LLVM debug nuget package for Windows. #33282
    7.0.0
  • microsoft.extensions.logging.generators.roslyn4.0.tests work item #72836
    7.0.0
  • All codefix providers should have `SharedAttribute` #72876
  • System.UnauthorizedAccessException in system.io.packaging.tests.tests.zippackage_createwithfileaccesswrite #72837
  • if I use `MONO_AOT_MODE_INTERP` execute mode, the corelib must be aot #72848
  • Synchronization in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore is inconsistent with the memory model #68623
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ConvertToLibraryImport analyzer and fixer to limit false-positives/code breaks #72965
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression of mutidimensional array. #72964
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Minor cleanup in MethodDesc::GetPrecompiledCode #72963
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add AllBitsSet DIM #72961
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added remaining APIs to complete NativeMemory set #72960
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader when it doesn't support serialization #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [libs][mono] Enable diagnostics_tracing runtime component in Android build #72955
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable tests that wait for compaction #72954
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove all pinvoke source generator attributes in aggressive trimming mode #72952
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947
  • Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #72945
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use the common path for lowering single-reg SIMD returns #72944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding overloads for configuring options with a IServiceProvider #72942
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Fix SslStress docker build #72940
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][wip] windows timeout test #72939
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Make JSON support required properties #72937
    area-System.Text.Json
  • #67853 check if tvos tests are still failing #72935
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm][draft] re-try downloading assets #72933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix race when receiving HEADERS and RST_STREAM in rapid succession. #72932
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WIP][Mono] Enable tests disabled by issue 36882. #72931
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try to keep cache value after startup validation when current Options is default unnamed one #72927
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • #51390 check if test still fails #72925
    area-System.IO
  • [wip][wasm] debugging v8 timeout on windows #72924
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add memory fences to ByRefAssignRef on Unix ARM64 #72919
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Get more libraries tests running with NativeAOT #72917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Linq.Queryable with RDC #72899
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Remove a few hardcoded instances of "net7.0" #72950
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add SqlTypes apis for SqlClient #72724
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make revocation tests use CRLBuilder instead of its own copy #72886
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Disable CrlBuilderTests.BuildEmptyRsaPss on Android #72948
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • CMake support in VS open folder for coreclr #70285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update windows.10.amd64.server20h2 to windows.amd64.server2022 #72868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add BuildCrlDistributionPointExtension #72898
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Modify workload to pick threading runtime packs #72412
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable ReadAsync_CancelPendingValueTask_ThrowsCancellationException for Http1 #72854
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix the NJulianRuleTest when running with libc check builds #72893
    7.0.0
  • Remove InvalidOperationException when reading system properties from EventLogRecords #72913
  • Bump timeout for "CoreCLR Tools Unit Tests Linux x64 checked" #72928
    area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r test #72901
  • Fix a couple of issues when using textual PGO input #72773
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #72842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable GitHub_35821 #72900
  • [wasm] enable more tests for web sockets #72843
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add missing System.Net docs #72459
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add a test that ensures we are using SubtleCrypto in WASM crypto tests #72892
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [mini] Emit a null check using MONO_EMIT_NEW_CHECK_THIS for GetArrayDataReference #72897
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1906193 #72884
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Redisable GetAndSet_AreThreadSafe_AndUpdatesNeverLeavesNullValues test #72882
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Delete DelegateInvokeThunk #72903
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update upstream ref for arm fp unwind support #71857
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exclude JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/TypeTestFolding from crossgen2 testing #72878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Android] Change active issue number #72863
    area-System.Text.Json, os-android
  • Add [Shared] to two CodeFixProviders #72885
  • [iOS] Skip test suites that take too long to build on helix #72849
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Fix ZipPackage_CreateWithFileAccessWrite test #72850
    area-System.IO
  • Fix Enumerable.Chunk throughput regression #72811
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix undisposed RegistryKeys in Microsoft.Win32.Registry tests #72117
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Avoid a couple theoretical reorderings in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #72657
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update the CustomMarshallerAttributeFixer to support adding missing methods for stateless marshaller shapes #72869
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72809
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.9
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [GeneratedRegex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable MsQuicTests.ConnectWithClientCertificate on Windows #70015
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Add extra Module.ModuleHandle test #72875
  • [wasm] Remove support for CommonJS #72865
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #72807
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][wbt] Test that `dotnet.js` could be run from any current directory #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Disqualify methods with modifiable `this` from OSR. #72877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • HTTP/3 Made alt-used show only on alt-svc redirect #72669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add more DataFlow tests from linker to NativeAOT #72777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] diagnostic server IPC fixups #72859
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • port BitArray.CopyTo to xplat hardware intrinsics #72788
    area-System.Collections
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check on tests we disabled on Linux #72832
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ref counting to the dotnet-counters providers #72894
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
